prompt: Design a dark-themed invoice generator with a sleek black background and vibrant green accent colors. Create a modern interface with a dark app bar featuring white text. The main content should be contained within a dark grey card with subtle elevation and rounded corners. Use a large green heading for 'Invoice Generator' at the top. Arrange form fields vertically with dark input fields that have green focused borders: company name, client name, invoice number with auto-increment, and a date selector with green calendar icon. Include a dark textarea for description with green accent border when focused. Design an item addition section with horizontally aligned fields for item name, quantity, and price, all with consistent dark styling. Display a real-time total in a dark container with green text highlighting. Finish with a full-width green gradient button for invoice generation with bold white text.
